newsitem.title: USA: Dal-Tile sees soft Q2, plus $0.29/shr charge.
newsitem.headline: Dal-Tile sees soft Q2, plus $0.29/shr charge.

text.p: Dal-Tile International Inc said Wednesday it expects a second quarter net loss due to higher transportations costs and sluggish revenue growth.
Dal-Tile said its quarterly earnings would be $0.11 to $0.13 of profits before a special charge. That is well below a Wall Street's forecast of $0.20, according to First Call.
It earned $0.10 a share in the year-ago quarter.
The ceramic tile maker also said it will take a second-quarter charge of $16.1 million or $0.29 a share for uncollectible receivables and overstocked inventories.
